thread.title: Judge Napolitano Doubles Down on Wiretapping Transcript Claims
thread.title_full: Judge Napolitano Doubles Down on Wiretapping Transcript Claims

author: Kim Smith
title: Judge Napolitano Doubles Down on Wiretapping Transcript Claims
text:
Napolitano first made the assertion in an op-ed piece for Fox News, where he claimed that Obama enlisted foreign intelligence to watch Trump because that would leave no trail to the White House. 
Napolitano was unequivocal in the piece: 
“Sources have told me that the British foreign surveillance service, the Government Communications Headquarters, known as GCHQ, most likely provided Obama with transcripts of Trump’s calls,” he wrote. 
The British government denied Napolitano’s claims, and Fox News anchor Shep Smith denounced the allegation, adding that the news division at the network was unable to confirm the judge’s assertion. 
While the issue is still cloudy, it’s good to see Napolitano is back on the air, as his insightful commentary is always worth listening to. 
H/T Fox News 
Share this story on Facebook and Twitter if you are glad to see the judge back on Fox News. What do you think about Judge Napolitano standing by his word? Scroll down to comment below! Suggest a correction Share on Facebook Share Tweet Email Email Print Popular Right Now
